description: Life on mountains covered with deep snow has granted this Pokémon a body of ice that's as hard as steel.

name: Alolan Sandslash
description: It uses large, hooked claws to cut a path through deep snow as it runs. On snowy mountains, this Sandslash is faster than any other Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spike Armor
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon is damaged by an attack, do 40 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Alolan Vulpix
description: After long years in the ever-snowcapped mountains of Alola, this Vulpix has gained power over ice.

attacks.name: Call Forth Cold
attacks.effect: Take a {W} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Alolan Ninetales
description: A deity resides in the snowy mountains where this Pokémon lives. In ancient times, it was worshiped as that deity's incarnation.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Shellder
description: It is encased in a shell that is harder than diamond. Inside, however, it is surprisingly tender.

name: Cloyster
description: Cloyster that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.

name: Lapras
description: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.

name: Popplio
description: The balloons it inflates with its nose grow larger and larger as it practices day by day.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Popplio
description: The balloons it inflates with its nose grow larger and larger as it practices day by day.

name: Brionne
description: It gets excited when it sees a dance it doesn't know. This hard worker practices diligently until it can learn that dance.

name: Primarina
description: To Primarina, every battle is a stage. It takes down its prey with beautiful singing and dancing.

abilities.name: Melodious Healing
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 30 damage from each of your {W} Pokémon.

attacks.name: Insatiable Striking
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Insatiable Striking attack does +40 damage.

name: Wishiwashi
description: Individually, they're incredibly weak. It's by gathering up into schools that they're able to confront opponents.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random Wishiwashi or Wishiwashi ex from your deck onto your Bench.

attacks.name: School Storm
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 more damage for each of your Benched Wishiwashi or Wishiwashi ex.

tcgdex_attacks.name: School Storm
tcgdex_attacks.effect: This attack does 40 more damage for each of your Benched Wishiwashi and Wishiwashi ex.

name: Dewpider
description: It forms a water bubble at the rear of its body and then covers its head with it. Meeting another Dewpider means comparing water-bubble sizes.

name: Araquanid
description: It launches water bubbles with its legs, drowning prey within the bubbles. This Pokémon can then take its time to savor its meal.

attacks.name: Dangerous Claws
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Basic Pokemon, this attack does 60 more damage.

tcgdex_attacks.name: Dangerous Claws
tcgdex_attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Basic Pokémon, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Pyukumuku
description: It lives in warm, shallow waters. If it encounters a foe, it will spit out its internal organs as a means to punch them.

abilities.name: Innards Out
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 50 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Bruxish
description: It grinds its teeth with great force to stimulate its brain. It fires the psychic energy created by this process from the protuberance on its head.

name: Tapu Fini
description: This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog, it came to be both feared and revered.

attacks.name: Spiral Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Pikachu
description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Alolan Geodude
description: If you mistake it for a rock and step on it, it will headbutt you in anger. In addition to the pain, it will also zap you with a shock.

name: Alolan Graveler
description: When two Graveler fight each other, it fills the surroundings with flashes of light and sound. People call it the “fireworks of the earth.”

name: Alolan Golem
description: It's grumpy and stubborn. If you upset it, it discharges electricity from the surface of its body and growls with a voice like thunder.

attacks.name: Super Zap Cannon
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {L} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Helioptile
description: When spread, the frills on its head act like solar panels, generating the power behind this Pokémon's electric moves.

name: Heliolisk
description: One Heliolisk basking in the sun with its frill outspread is all it would take to produce enough electricity to power a city.

name: Charjabug
description: While its durable shell protects it from attacks, Charjabug strikes at enemies with jolts of electricity discharged from the tips of its jaws.

name: Vikavolt
description: It builds up electricity in its abdomen, focuses it through its jaws, and then fires the electricity off in concentrated beams.

attacks.name: Disconnect
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, they can't play any Item cards from their hand.

name: Oricorio
description: This form of Oricorio has sipped yellow nectar. It uses nimble steps to approach opponents, then knocks them out with electric punches.

abilities.name: Safeguard
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon ex.

name: Togedemaru
description: With the long hairs on its back, this Pokémon takes in electricity from other electric Pokémon. It stores what it absorbs in an electric sac.

attacks.name: Electrosmash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Tapu Koko
description: Although it's called a guardian deity, if a person or Pokémon puts it in a bad mood, it will become a malevolent deity and attack.

attacks.name: Volt Switch
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched {L} Pokémon.

name: Mr. Mime
description: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

attacks.name: Barrier Shove
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Sableye
description: It dwells in the darkness of caves. It uses its sharp claws to dig up gems to nourish itself.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Spoink
description: Spoink will die if it stops bouncing. The pearl on its head amplifies its psychic powers.

attacks.name: Psycharge
attacks.effect: Take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Grumpig
description: It can perform odd dance steps to influence foes. Its style of dancing became hugely popular overseas.

name: Lunatone
description: The phase of the moon apparently has some effect on its power. It's active on the night of a full moon.

name: Shuppet
description: It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people.

name: Banette
description: This Pokémon developed from an abandoned doll that amassed a grudge. It is seen in dark alleys.

attacks.name: Night Bind
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, they can't take any Energy from their Energy Zone to attach to their Active Pokémon.

name: Oricorio
description: This form of Oricorio has sipped pink nectar. It elevates its mind with the gentle steps of its dance, then unleashes its psychic energy.

attacks.name: Dazzle Dance
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Oricorio
description: This form of Oricorio has sipped purple nectar. It uses ethereal dance steps to call forth the spirits of the dead.

attacks.name: Spiteful Dance
attacks.effect: If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out by damage from an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Cutiefly
description: Nectar and pollen are its favorite fare. In fields of flowers, it gets into skirmishes with Butterfree over food.

name: Ribombee
description: It makes pollen puffs from pollen and nectar. The puffs' effects depend on the type of ingredients and how much of each one is used.

name: Comfey
description: Comfey picks flowers with its vine and decorates itself with them. For some reason, flowers won't wither once they're attached to a Comfey.

abilities.name: Flower Shield
abilities.effect: Each of your Pokémon that has any {P} Energy attached recovers from all Special Conditions and can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

name: Sandygast
description: If it loses its shovel, it will stick something else—like a branch—in its head to make do until it finds another shovel.

name: Palossand
description: The terrifying Palossand drags smaller Pokémon into its sandy body. Once its victims are trapped, it drains them of their vitality whenever it pleases.

name: Mimikyu
description: There was a scientist who peeked under Mimikyu's old rag in the name of research. The scientist died of a mysterious disease.

attacks.name: Shadow Hit
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your Pokémon.

name: Tapu Lele
description: It heals the wounds of people and Pokémon by sprinkling them with its sparkling scales. This guardian deity is worshiped on Akala.

attacks.name: Energy Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each Energy attached to that Pokémon.

name: Cosmog
description: Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn't seem to care.

attacks.name: Teleport
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Cosmoem
description: The king who ruled Alola in times of antiquity called it the “cocoon of the stars” and built an altar to worship it.

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes -50 damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Psychic Connect
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may move all {P} Energy from 1 of your Benched {P} Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

name: Necrozma
description: It looks somehow pained as it rages around in search of light, which serves as its energy. It's apparently from another world.

attacks.name: Prismatic Laser
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: Cubone
description: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.

name: Makuhita
description: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy Pokémon that can withstand any attack.

name: Hariyama
description: It loves challenging others to tests of strength. It has the power to stop a train with a slap.

attacks.name: Push Out
attacks.effect: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

name: Solrock
description: When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to the sun, thus blinding its foes.

name: Drilbur
description: It brings its claws together and whirls around at high speed before rushing toward its prey.

name: Timburr
description: It loves helping out with construction projects. It loves it so much that if rain causes work to halt, it swings its log around and throws a tantrum.

name: Gurdurr
description: It shows off its muscles to Machoke and other Gurdurr. If it fails to measure up to the other Pokémon, it lies low for a little while.

name: Conkeldurr
description: Concrete mixed by Conkeldurr is much more durable than normal concrete, even when the compositions of the two materials are the same.

abilities.name: Guts
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.

name: Crabrawler
description: This Pokémon punches trees and eats the berries that drop down, training itself and getting food at the same time.

name: Rockruff
description: This Pokémon is very friendly when it's young. Its disposition becomes vicious once it matures, but it never forgets the kindness of its master.

attacks.name: Signs of Evolution
attacks.effect: Put a random card that evolves from Rockruff from your deck into your hand.

name: Rockruff
description: This Pokémon is very friendly when it's young. Its disposition becomes vicious once it matures, but it never forgets the kindness of its master.

name: Lycanroc
description: Lycanroc attacks its prey with its sharp claws and fangs. It loyally obeys the instructions of a Trainer it trusts.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Lycanroc
description: This Pokémon uses its rocky mane to slash any who approach. It will even disobey its Trainer if it dislikes the orders it was given.

attacks.name: Blood Fang
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has more remaining HP than this Pokémon, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Mudbray
description: This Pokémon covers itself in mud that it has regurgitated. The mud won't dry out even if it's exposed to the sun for a long time.

name: Mudsdale
description: This Pokémon has been treasured not just for its physical labor but also because it produces high-quality mud used for making pottery.

attacks.name: High Horsepower
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 40 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Offload Pass
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, move all {F} Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Minior
description: Places where Minior fall from the night sky are few and far between, with Alola being one of the precious few.

attacks.name: Star Drop
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Alolan Rattata
description: It shows no interest in anything that isn't fresh. If you take it shopping with you, it will help you pick out ingredients.

name: Alolan Raticate
description: It has an incredibly greedy personality. Its nest is filled with so much food gathered by Rattata at its direction, it can't possibly eat it all.

attacks.name: Scrounge-and-Scarf
attacks.effect: Discard a random Item card from your opponent's hand.

name: Alolan Meowth
description: It's accustomed to luxury because it used to live with Alolan royalty. As a result, it's very picky about food.

name: Alolan Persian
description: The round face of Alolan Persian is considered to be a symbol of prosperity in the Alola region, so these Pokémon are very well cared for.

abilities.name: Fur Coat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Alolan Grimer
description: There are a hundred or so of them living in Alola's waste-disposal site. They're all hard workers who eat a lot of trash.

attacks.name: Chemical Panic
attacks.effect: 1 Special Condition from among Asleep, Burned, Confused, Paralyzed, and Poisoned is chosen at random, and your opponent's Active Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition. Any Special Conditions already affecting that Pokémon will not be chosen.

name: Absol
description: Swift as the wind, Absol races through fields and mountains. Its curved, bow-like horn is acutely sensitive to the warning signs of natural disasters.

attacks.name: Unseen Claw
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Trubbish
description: Its favorite places are unsanitary ones. If you leave trash lying around, you could even find one of these Pokémon living in your room.

name: Garbodor
description: This Pokémon eats trash, which turns into poison inside its body. The main component of the poison depends on what sort of trash was eaten.

attacks.name: Super Poison Breath
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Mareanie
description: This Pokémon wanders the seaside looking for food. It often gets electric shocks from broken Pincurchin spines that it tries to eat.

name: Toxapex
description: This Pokémon lives within a dome made by its own legs. Toxapex monitors its surroundings by sensing the flow of the tide through its spikes.

attacks.name: Spike Cannon
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Alolan Diglett
description: The metal-rich geology of this Pokémon's habitat caused it to develop steel whiskers on its head.

name: Alolan Dugtrio
description: Their beautiful, metallic whiskers create a sort of protective helmet on their heads, and they also function as highly precise sensors.

attacks.name: Iron Head
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 70 damage for each heads.

name: Excadrill
description: It's not uncommon for tunnels that appear to have formed naturally to actually be a result of Excadrill's rampant digging.

name: Escavalier
description: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.

attacks.name: Pike
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Klefki
description: Once it absorbs a key's metal ions, it discards the key without a second thought. However, it will hang on to keys it favors for decades.

attacks.name: Unlock
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

abilities.name: Rising Road
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sol Breaker
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Magearna
description: It synchronizes its consciousness with others to understand their feelings. This faculty makes it useful for taking care of people.

attacks.name: Silver Cannon
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has an Ability, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Drampa
description: The mountains it calls home are nearly two miles in height. On rare occasions, it descends to play with the children living in the towns below.

attacks.name: Berserk
attacks.effect: If any of your Benched Pokémon have damage on them, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Jangmo-o
description: They learn to fight by smashing their head scales together. The dueling strengthens both their skills and their spirits.

name: Hakamo-o
description: The scaleless, scarred parts of its body are signs of its strength. It shows them off to defeated opponents.

name: Kommo-o
description: It clatters its tail scales to unnerve opponents. This Pokémon will battle only those who stand steadfast in the face of this display.

attacks.name: Clanging Scales
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes +30 damage from attacks.

name: Tauros
description: When Tauros begins whipping itself with its tails, it's a warning that the Pokémon is about to charge with astounding speed.

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Skitty
description: It can't stop itself from chasing moving things, and it runs in a circle, chasing its own tail.

name: Delcatty
description: It dislikes dirty places. It often searches for a comfortable place in which to groom itself.

attacks.name: Energy Assist
attacks.effect: Take a {C} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Fletchling
description: This Pokémon is normally calm, but once it enters battle, its hormonal balance changes and it becomes aggressive.

name: Hawlucha
description: Its elegant finishing moves—performed by nimbly leaping around using its wings—are polished in the forest where it was born and raised.

attacks.name: Justified Press
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a {D} Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Pikipek
description: It pecks at trees with its hard beak. You can get some idea of its mood or condition from the rhythm of its pecking.

name: Trumbeak
description: It can bend the tip of its beak to produce over a hundred different cries at will.

name: Toucannon
description: They smack beaks with others of their kind to communicate. The strength and number of hits tell each other how they feel.

name: Yungoos
description: Its stomach fills most of its torso. It wanders the same path every day, searching for fresh food.

name: Gumshoos
description: Once it finds signs of prey, it will patiently stake out the location, waiting until the sun goes down.

name: Stufful
description: Its fluffy fur is a delight to pet, but carelessly reaching out to touch this Pokémon could result in painful retaliation.

name: Bewear
description: Once it accepts you as a friend, it tries to show its affection with a hug. Letting it do that is dangerous—it could easily shatter your bones.

attacks.name: Tantrum
attacks.effect: This Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Oranguru
description: People used to mistake Oranguru for a human when they saw it issue command after command to the other Pokémon of the forest.

attacks.name: Primate's Trap
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon cost 1 {C} more, and its Retreat Cost is 1 {C} more.

name: Komala
description: Komala spends its entire life sleeping. It feeds on leaves that contain a potent poison only Komala can break down.

abilities.name: Comatose
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, whenever you attach an Energy from your Energy Zone to it, it is now Asleep.

name: Big Malasada
effect: Heal 10 damage and remove a random Special Condition from your Active Pokémon.

name: Fishing Net
effect: Put a random Basic {W} Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Rare Candy
effect: Choose 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. If you have a Stage 2 card in your hand that evolves from that Pokémon, put that card onto the Basic Pokémon to evolve it, skipping the Stage 1. You can't use this card during your first turn or on a Basic Pokémon that was put into play this turn.

name: Rotom Dex
effect: Look at the top card of your deck. Then, you may shuffle your deck.

name: Poison Barb
effect: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Leaf Cape
effect: The {G} Pokémon this card is attached to gets +30 HP.

name: Acerola
effect: Choose 1 of your Palossand or Mimikyu that has damage on it, and move 40 of its damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Ilima
effect: Put 1 of your {C} Pokémon that has damage on it into your hand.

name: Kiawe
effect: Choose 1 of your Alolan Marowak or Turtonator. Take 2 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to that Pokémon. Your turn ends.

name: Guzma
effect: Discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Lana
effect: You can use this card only if you have Araquanid in play. Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot.

name: Sophocles
effect: During this turn, attacks used by your Alolan Golem, Vikavolt, or Togedemaru do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Mallow
effect: Heal all damage from 1 of your Shiinotic or Tsareena. If you do, discard all Energy from that Pokémon.

name: Lillie
effect: Heal 60 damage from 1 of your Stage 2 Pokemon.

name: Alolan Exeggutor
description: Blazing sunlight has brought out the true form and powers of this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tropical Hammer
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Morelull
description: Pokémon living in the forest eat the delicious caps on Morelull's head. The caps regrow overnight.

name: Tsareena
description: This Pokémon is proud and aggressive. However, it is said that a Tsareena will instantly become calm if someone touches the crown on its calyx.

attacks.name: Three Kick Combo
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

name: Tapu Bulu
description: Although it's called a guardian deity, it's violent enough to crush anyone it sees as an enemy.

attacks.name: Stuck-In Tackle
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Alolan Marowak
description: This Pokémon sets the bone it holds on fire and dances through the night as a way to mourn its fallen allies.

attacks.name: Burning Bonemerang
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 70 damage for each heads. If at least 1 of them is heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

name: Turtonator
description: Explosive substances coat the shell on its back. Enemies that dare attack it will be blown away by an immense detonation.

name: Bulbasaur
description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.

name: Ivysaur
description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: Venusaur
description: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Exeggcute
description: Though it may look like it's just a bunch of eggs, it's a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

name: Exeggutor
description: Each of Exeggutor's three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don't seem to be very interested in one another.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Squirtle
description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

name: Wartortle
description: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

name: Blastoise
description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {W} Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

tcgdex_attacks.name: Hydro Pump
tcgdex_attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {W} Energy attached, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Staryu
description: If you visit a beach at the end of summer, you'll be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a steady rhythm.

name: Starmie
description: This Pokémon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.

name: Gastly
description: It wraps its opponent in its gas-like body, slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it through the skin.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck.

name: Haunter
description: It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.

name: Gengar
description: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey's shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.

attacks.name: Bother
attacks.effect: Your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand during their next turn.

name: Machop
description: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though it's the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.

name: Machoke
description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: Machamp
description: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

attacks.name: Power Press
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {F} Energy attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Cubone
description: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.

attacks.name: Growl
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do -20 damage.

name: Marowak
description: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.

name: Jigglypuff
description: It hugely inflates its stomach and sings a mysterious melody. If you hear this melody, you'll become sleepy right away.
tcgdex_description: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
description: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a body slam.

name: Kakuna

name: Pinsir
description: These Pokémon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.

attacks.name: Guillotine Rush

name: Sprigatito
description: Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants. This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep it from drying out.

name: Floragato
description: Floragato deftly wields the vine hidden beneath its long fur, slamming the hard flower bud against its opponents.

name: Meowscarada
description: This Pokémon uses the reflective fur lining its cape to camouflage the stem of its flower, creating the illusion that the flower is floating.

name: Charmander
description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

attacks.name: Stoke
attacks.effect: Take 3 {R} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Magmar
description: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

name: Magmortar
description: When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

attacks.name: Smoke Bomb
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.

name: Paldean Tauros
description: When heated by fire energy, its horns can get hotter than 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit. Those gored by them will suffer both wounds and burns.

attacks.name: Blaze Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Tentacool
description: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.

name: Tentacruel
description: When the red orbs on Tentacruel's head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.

name: Buizel
description: It inflates its flotation sac, keeping its face above water in order to watch for prey movement.

name: Floatzel
description: With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.

attacks.name: Water Arrow

name: Wiglett
description: This Pokémon can pick up the scent of a Veluza just over 65 feet away and will hide itself in the sand.

name: Dondozo

attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Tatsugiri
description: This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives inside the mouth of Dondozo to protect itself from enemies on the outside.

name: Voltorb

name: Electrode
description: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

attacks.name: Tumbling Attack

name: Pachirisu
description: It's one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.

name: Pawmi

name: Pawmo
description: When its group is attacked, Pawmo is the first to leap into battle, defeating enemies with a fighting technique that utilizes electric shocks.

name: Pawmot
description: This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.

abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Abra

name: Kadabra
description: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.

name: Alakazam
description: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

attacks.name: Psychic Suppression
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any Energy attached.

name: Mr. Mime
description: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

attacks.name: Juggling
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Drifloon
description: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

name: Drifblim
description: It can generate and release gas within its body. That's how it can control the altitude of its drift.

name: Hitmonlee
description: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.

name: Hitmonchan
description: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

name: Riolu
description: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

attacks.name: Aura Sphere
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Flamigo
description: This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does not escape from its beak.

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

name: Ekans
description: By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

name: Arbok
description: After stunning its opponents with the pattern on its stomach, it quickly wraps them up in its body and waits for them to stop moving.

attacks.name: Venomous Fang
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Paldean Wooper
description: After losing a territorial struggle, Wooper began living on land. The Pokémon changed over time, developing a poisonous film to protect its body.

attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Venoshock

description: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray

name: Shroodle
description: Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will sink its sharp, poison-soaked front teeth into any that anger it, causing paralysis in the object of its ire.

name: Grafaiai
description: The color of the poisonous saliva depends on what the Pokémon eats. Grafaiai covers its fingers in its saliva and draws patterns on trees in forests.

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description: It swings its handmade hammer around to protect itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon that eat metal.

name: Tinkatuff
description: This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawniard and Bisharp, gathering metal from them in order to create a large and sturdy hammer.

name: Varoom
description: It is said that this Pokémon was born when an unknown poison Pokémon entered and inspirited an engine left at a scrap-processing factory.

name: Revavroom
description: It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders— now numbering eight—to generate energy.

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

description: Lickilicky's strange tongue can stretch to many times the length of its body. No one has figured out how Lickilicky's tongue can stretch so far.

description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

attacks.name: Carefree Press
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

description: Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings. If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds with superdestructive kicks.

description: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.

description: The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which allows it to float.

name: Magneton
description: Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.

name: Magnezone
description: As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems to be receiving signals of unknown origin while transmitting signals of unknown purpose.

attacks.name: Thunder Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a {L} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Voltorb
description: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.

attacks.name: Big Explosion
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

name: Electrode
description: The more energy it charges up, the faster it gets. But this also makes it more likely to explode.

name: Electabuzz
description: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.

attacks.name: Charge
attacks.effect: Take a {L} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Electivire
description: The amount of electrical energy this Pokémon produces is proportional to the rate of its pulse. The voltage jumps while Electivire is battling.

attacks.name: Exciting Voltage
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra {L} Energy attached, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Shinx
description: The extension and contraction of its muscles generates electricity. It glows when in trouble.

attacks.name: Hide
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Luxio
description: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

name: Luxray
description: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.

attacks.name: Volt Bolt
attacks.effect: Discard all {L} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sparking Gadget
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Rotom
description: Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.

attacks.name: Assault Laser
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Togepi
description: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

name: Togetic
description: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.

name: Togekiss
description: These Pokémon are never seen anywhere near conflict or turmoil. In recent times, they've hardly been seen at all.

attacks.name: Overdrive Smash
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overdrive Smash attack does +60 damage.

name: Misdreavus
description: This Pokémon startles people in the middle of the night. It gathers fear as its energy.

attacks.name: Magical Delusion
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Ralts
description: The horns on its head provide a strong power that enables it to sense people's emotions.

attacks.name: Teleport
attacks.effect: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Kirlia
description: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.

name: Duskull
description: If it finds bad children who won't listen to their parents, it will spirit them away—or so it's said.

name: Dusclops
description: It seeks drifting will-o'-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.

name: Dusknoir
description: At the bidding of transmissions from the spirit world, it steals people and Pokémon away. No one knows whether it has a will of its own.

abilities.name: Shadow Void
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may choose 1 of your Pokémon that has damage on it, and move all of its damage to this Pokémon.

name: Drifloon
description: It is whispered that any child who mistakes Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could wind up missing.

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.

name: Drifblim
description: Some say this Pokémon is a collection of souls burdened with regrets, silently drifting through the dusk.

name: Uxie
description: Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

attacks.name: Mind Boost
attacks.effect: Take a {P} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to Mesprit or Azelf.

name: Mesprit
description: Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

attacks.name: Supreme Blast
attacks.effect: You can use this attack only if you have Uxie and Azelf on your Bench. Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Azelf
description: Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

attacks.name: Psychic Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Giratina
description: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has any Energy attached, it has no Retreat Cost.

name: Cresselia
description: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

attacks.name: Moonlight Gain
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokémon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.

name: Rhydon
description: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.

name: Rhyperior
description: It can load up to three projectiles per arm into the holes in its hands. What launches out of those holes could be either rocks or Roggenrola.

attacks.name: Mountain Swing
attacks.effect: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Gligar
description: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.

name: Gliscor
description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

attacks.name: Acrobatics
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Hitmontop
description: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.

name: Nosepass
description: It moves less than an inch a year, but when it's in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the ground in a split second.

name: Regirock
description: Every bit of Regirock's body is made of stone. As parts of its body erode, this Pokémon sticks rocks to itself to repair what's been lost.

abilities.name: Exoskeleton
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Cranidos
description: A primeval Pokémon, it possesses a hard and sturdy skull, lacking any intelligence within.

name: Rampardos
description: In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.

attacks.name: Head Smash
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from this attack, this Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.

name: Wormadam
description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

name: Riolu
description: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.

name: Lucario
description: It's said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras—even those of foes it could not otherwise see.

abilities.name: Fighting Coach
abilities.effect: Attacks used by your {F} Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Hippopotas
description: It shuts its nostrils tight, then travels through sand as if walking. They form colonies of around 10.

name: Hippowdon
description: It is surprisingly quick to anger. It holds its mouth agape as a display of its strength.

attacks.name: Energized Blade
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Murkrow
description: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

name: Honchkrow
description: It is merciless by nature. It is said that it never forgives the mistakes of its Murkrow followers.

attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Sneasel
description: This cunning Pokémon hides under the cover of darkness, waiting to attack its prey.

attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Scratching Nails
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Poochyena
description: A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.

name: Mightyena
description: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.

name: Stunky
description: It sprays a foul fluid from its rear. Its stench spreads over a mile radius, driving Pokémon away.

name: Skuntank
description: It attacks by spraying a horribly smelly fluid from the tip of its tail. Attacks from above confound it.

attacks.name: Poison Gas
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Spiritomb
description: Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a mysterious spell.

attacks.name: Swirling Disaster
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Skorupi
description: After burrowing into the sand, it waits patiently for prey to come near. This Pokémon and Sizzlipede share common descent.

name: Drapion
description: Its poison is potent, but it rarely sees use. This Pokémon prefers to use physical force instead, going on rampages with its car-crushing strength.

attacks.name: Cross Poison
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads. If at least 2 of them are heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Croagunk
description: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

attacks.name: Group Beatdown
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Toxicroak
description: Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges out with its poisonous claws.

attacks.name: Group Beatdown
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

name: Darkrai
description: It chases people and Pokémon from its territory by causing them to experience deep, nightmarish slumbers.

attacks.name: Dark Void
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Nightmare Aura
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a {D} Energy from your Energy Zone to this Pokémon, do 20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Skarmory
description: People fashion swords from Skarmory's shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.

attacks.name: Metal Arms
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Registeel
description: Registeel's body is made of a strange material that is flexible enough to stretch and shrink but also more durable than any metal.

name: Shieldon
description: A mild-mannered, herbivorous Pokémon, it used its face to dig up tree roots to eat. The skin on its face was plenty tough.

name: Bastiodon
description: The bones of its face are huge and hard, so they were mistaken for its spine until after this Pokémon was successfully restored.

abilities.name: Guarded Grill
abilities.effect: If any damage is done to this Pokémon by attacks, flip a coin. If heads, this Pokémon takes −100 damage from that attack.

name: Wormadam
description: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.

attacks.name: Iron Head
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Bronzor
description: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.

name: Bronzong
description: In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes -20 damage from attacks.

name: Probopass
description: Although it can control its units known as Mini-Noses, they sometimes get lost and don't come back.

attacks.name: Triple Nose
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 50 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Metallic Turbo
attacks.effect: Take 2 {M} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Heatran
description: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

attacks.name: Steel Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Gible
description: It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy passes by, it leaps out and chomps them. The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: Gabite
description: In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales. Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient will make a weary body feel invigorated.

name: Garchomp
description: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

abilities.name: Reckless Shearing
abilities.effect: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw a card.

name: Lickitung
description: If this Pokémon's sticky saliva gets on you and you don't clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch won't go away, either.

attacks.name: Licking Fury
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

name: Eevee
description: Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

tcgdex_attacks.name: Quick Attack
tcgdex_attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Porygon
description: State-of-the-art technology was used to create Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokémon to be created via computer programming.

name: Porygon2
description: This is a Porygon that was updated with special data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about many different subjects all on its own.

name: Porygon-Z
description: Porygon-Z had a program installed to allow it to move between dimensions, but the program also caused instability in Porygon-Z's behavior.

attacks.name: Buggy Beam
attacks.effect: Change the type of the next Energy that will be generated for your opponent to 1 of the following at random: {G}, {R}, {W}, {L}, {P}, {F}, {D}, or {M}.

name: Aipom
description: As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.

name: Ambipom
description: It uses its tails for everything. If it wraps both of its tails around you and gives you a squeeze, that's proof it really likes you.

attacks.name: Double Hit
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

name: Starly
description: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

attacks.name: Pluck
attacks.effect: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tools from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Staravia
description: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.

name: Staraptor
description: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

attacks.name: Clutch
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Bidoof
description: With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is more agile and active than it appears.

attacks.name: Super Fang
attacks.effect: Halve your opponent's Active Pokémon's remaining HP, rounded down.

name: Bibarel
description: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.

name: Buneary
description: If both of Buneary's ears are rolled up, something is wrong with its body or mind. It's a sure sign the Pokémon is in need of care.

name: Lopunny
description: Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings. If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds with superdestructive kicks.

attacks.name: Jump Kick
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Glameow
description: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

attacks.name: Pose
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Purugly
description: It would claim another Pokémon's nest as its own if it finds a nest sufficiently comfortable.

attacks.name: Interrupt
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand. Choose a card you find there and shuffle it into your opponent's deck.

name: Chatot
description: It mimics the cries of other Pokémon to trick them into thinking it's one of them. This way they won't attack it.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

tcgdex_attacks.name: Fury Attack
tcgdex_attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

name: Fan Rotom
description: This Rotom has entered an electric fan. It smirks with satisfaction over a prank well pulled after it blows away everything around it.

attacks.name: Spin Storm
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, put your opponent's Active Pokémon into their hand.

name: Regigigas
description: It is said to have made Pokémon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.

attacks.name: Raging Hammer
attacks.effect: This attack does more damage equal to the damage this Pokémon has on it.

name: Skull Fossil
effect: Play this card as if it were a 40-HP Basic {C} Pokémon. At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play. This card can't retreat.

name: Armor Fossil
effect: Play this card as if it were a 40-HP Basic {C} Pokémon. At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play. This card can't retreat.

name: Pokémon Communication
effect: Choose a Pokémon in your hand and switch it with a random Pokémon in your deck.

name: Giant Cape
effect: The Pokémon this card is attached to gets +20 HP.

name: Rocky Helmet
effect: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Lum Berry
effect: At the end of each turn, if the Pokémon this card is attached to is affected by any Special Conditions, it recovers from all of them, and discard this card.

name: Cyrus
effect: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has damage on it to the Active Spot.

name: Team Galactic Grunt
effect: Put 1 random Glameow, Stunky, or Croagunk from your deck into your hand.

name: Cynthia
effect: During this turn, attacks used by your Garchomp or Togekiss do +50 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Volkner
effect: Choose 1 of your Electivire or Luxray. Attach 2 {L} Energy from your discard pile to that Pokémon.

name: Dawn
effect: Move an Energy from 1 of your Benched Pokémon to your Active Pokémon.

name: Mars
effect: Your opponent shuffles their hand into their deck and draws a card for each of their remaining points needed to win.

name: Tangrowth
description: Tangrowth has two arms that it can extend as it pleases. Recent research has shown that these arms are, in fact, bundles of vines.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Combee
description: At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a hundred, packed closely together in a lump.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Put 1 random Basic Pokémon from your deck onto your Bench.

name: Carnivine
description: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

attacks.name: Flog
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Shaymin
description: It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

abilities.name: Fragrant Flower Garden
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 10 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: Mamoswine
description: This Pokémon can be spotted in wall paintings from as far back as 10,000 years ago. For a while, it was thought to have gone extinct.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks from {R} or {W} Pokémon.

description: They normally inhabit rocky seashores, but in times of continuous rain, they can sometimes be found in the mountains, far from the sea.

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

description: It is born with a wondrous power that lets it bond with any kind of Pokémon.

name: Exeggcute
description: Though it may look like it's just a bunch of eggs, it's a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

attacks.name: Growth Spurt
attacks.effect: Take a {G} Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Exeggutor

name: Serperior
description: It only gives its all against strong opponents who are not fazed by the glare from Serperior's noble eyes.

abilities.name: Jungle Totem
abilities.effect: Each {G} Energy attached to your {G} Pokémon provides 2 {G} Energy. This effect doesn't stack.

name: Morelull
description: Pokémon living in the forest eat the delicious caps on Morelull's head. The caps regrow overnight.

name: Shiinotic
description: Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing, it drains their vitality with its fingertips.

attacks.name: Flickering Spores

name: Dhelmise
description: After a piece of seaweed merged with debris from a sunken ship, it was reborn as this ghost Pokémon.

name: Ponyta
description: It can't run properly when it's newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.

attacks.name: Stomp
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Rapidash
description: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Magmar
description: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {R} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Larvesta
description: This Pokémon was called the Larva That Stole the Sun. The fire Larvesta spouts from its horns can cut right through a sheet of iron.

name: Volcarona
description: Its burning body causes it to be unpopular in hot parts of the world, but in cold ones, Volcarona is revered as an embodiment of the sun.

attacks.name: Volcanic Ash
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {R} Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Salandit
description: It taunts its prey and lures them into narrow, rocky areas where it then sprays them with toxic gas to make them dizzy and take them down.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Salazzle

attacks.name: Poison Claws
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Magikarp
description: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions but never more than seven feet.

attacks.name: Leap Out

name: Vaporeon
description: It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

abilities.name: Wash Out
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may move a {W} Energy from 1 of your Benched {W} Pokémon to your Active {W} Pokémon.

name: Finneon
description: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.

name: Lumineon
description: With its shining light, it lures its prey close. However, the light also happens to attract ferocious fish Pokémon—its natural predators.

attacks.name: Aqua Liner
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Chewtle
description: Its large front tooth is still growing in. When the tooth itches, this Pokémon will bite another Chewtle's horn, and the two Pokémon will tussle.

name: Drednaw
description: Its massive, jagged teeth can crush a boulder in a single bite. This Pokémon has an extremely vicious disposition.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Cramorant
description: It's so strong that it can knock out some opponents in a single hit, but it also may forget what it's battling midfight.

attacks.name: Dive
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

name: Pikachu
description: When it is angered, it immediately discharges the energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

attacks.name: Circle Circuit
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage for each of your Benched {L} Pokémon.

name: Raichu
description: Its tail discharges electricity into the ground, protecting it from getting shocked.

attacks.name: Gigashock
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Electabuzz
description: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.

attacks.name: Thunder Spear
attacks.effect: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Joltik
description: Joltik can be found clinging to other Pokémon. It's soaking up static electricity because it can't produce a charge on its own.

name: Galvantula
description: It launches electrified fur from its abdomen as its means of attack. Opponents hit by the fur could be in for three full days and nights of paralysis.

attacks.name: Electroweb
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Dedenne
description: It's small and its electricity-generating organ is not fully developed, so it uses its tail to absorb electricity from people's homes and charge itself.

attacks.name: Thunder Shock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Mew
description: Because it can use all kinds of moves, many scientists believe Mew to be the ancestor of Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psy Report
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand.

attacks.name: Genome Hacking
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Active Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

name: Sigilyph
description: Psychic power allows these Pokémon to fly. Some say they were the guardians of an ancient city. Others say they were the guardians' emissaries.

attacks.name: Spike Draw
attacks.effect: Draw a card.

name: Elgyem
description: If this Pokémon stands near a TV, strange scenery will appear on the screen. That scenery is said to be from its home.

name: Beheeyem

attacks.name: Mind Jack
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Flabébé
description: This Pokémon can draw forth the power hidden within blooming wild flowers. It is particularly fond of red flowers.

attacks.name: Hypnotic Gaze
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Floette
description: This Pokémon draws forth what power is left in withered flowers to make them healthy again. It holds a red flower.

attacks.name: Leaf Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Florges
description: This Pokémon creates an impressive flower garden in its territory. It draws forth the power of the red flowers around its neck.

attacks.name: Bloomshine
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from each of your Pokémon.

name: Swirlix
description: It eats its own weight in sugar every day. If it doesn't get enough sugar, it becomes incredibly grumpy.

name: Slurpuff

name: Mankey

attacks.name: Focus Fist

description: When Golem grow old, they stop shedding their shells. Those that have lived a long, long time have shells green with moss.

abilities.effect: Your opponent can't play any Pokémon from their hand to evolve their Active Pokémon.

description: It slips into the shadows of others and mimics their powers and movements. As it improves, it becomes stronger than those it's imitating.

name: Liepard

name: Venipede
description: Venipede and Sizzlipede are similar species, but when the two meet, a huge fight ensues.

name: Whirlipede
description: This Pokémon spins itself rapidly and charges into its opponents. Its top speed is just over 60 mph.

attacks.name: Poison Sting

description: Druddigon lives in caves, but it never skips sunbathing—it won't be able to move if its body gets too cold.

name: Pidgeotto
description: The claws on its feet are well developed. It can carry prey such as an Exeggcute to its nest over 60 miles away.

attacks.name: Scattering Cyclone

description: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

description: The bug is mostly dead, with the mushroom on its back having become the main body. If the mushroom comes off, the bug stops moving.

name: Venonat
description: Poison oozes from all over its body. It catches small bug Pokémon at night that are attracted by light.

name: Venomoth
description: The wings are covered with dustlike scales. Every time it flaps its wings, it looses highly toxic dust.

attacks.name: Poison Powder
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description: Even though its body is extremely skinny, it is blindingly fast when catching its prey.

name: Weepinbell
description: The leafy parts act as cutters for slashing foes. It spits a fluid that dissolves everything.

name: Victreebel
description: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

name: Exeggcute
description: Though it may look like it's just a bunch of eggs, it's a proper Pokémon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.

name: Exeggutor
description: Each of Exeggutor's three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don't seem to be very interested in one another.

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.

description: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokémon's true appearance remains a mystery.

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Scyther
description: It slashes through grass with its sharp scythes, moving too fast for the human eye to track.

name: Pinsir
description: These Pokémon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.

attacks.name: Double Horn
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

name: Cottonee
description: It shoots cotton from its body to protect itself. If it gets caught up in hurricane-strength winds, it can get sent to the other side of the Earth.

name: Whimsicott
description: It scatters cotton all over the place as a prank. If it gets wet, it'll become too heavy to move and have no choice but to answer for its mischief.

name: Petilil
description: The leaves on its head grow right back even if they fall out. These bitter leaves refresh those who eat them.

attacks.name: Blot
attacks.effect: Heal 10 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Lilligant
description: The fragrance of the garland on its head has a relaxing effect, but taking care of it is very difficult.

attacks.name: Leaf Supply

name: Skiddo

attacks.name: Surprise Attack

name: Gogoat
description: It can sense the feelings of others by touching them with its horns. This species has assisted people with their work since 5,000 years ago.

name: Charmander
description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Discard a {R} Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Charmeleon
description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
tcgdex_description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

name: Charizard
description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

tcgdex_description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

description: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.

name: Arcanine

name: Moltres
description: It's one of the legendary bird Pokémon. When Moltres flaps its flaming wings, they glimmer with a dazzling red glow.

description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

name: Wartortle

name: Blastoise
description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.

name: Tentacruel

attacks.name: Poison Tentacles

name: Seel

name: Dewgong

name: Shellder
description: It is encased in a shell that is harder than diamond. Inside, however, it is surprisingly tender.

name: Cloyster

abilities.effect: This Pokémon takes -10 damage from attacks.

name: Kingler

name: Horsea

name: Seadra

attacks.name: Water Arrow

tcgdex_attacks.name: Water Arrow
tcgdex_attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Goldeen

name: Seaking

attacks.name: Horn Hazard
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Staryu

name: Starmie
description: This Pokémon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.

name: Magikarp

name: Gyarados
description: Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. It remains enraged until it demolishes everything around it.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Lapras
description: A smart and kindhearted Pokémon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump

name: Vaporeon
description: It lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin, which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

attacks.name: Bubble Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Omanyte
description: Because some Omanyte manage to escape after being restored or are released into the wild by people, this species is becoming a problem.

name: Omastar
description: Weighed down by a large and heavy shell, Omastar couldn't move very fast. Some say it went extinct because it was unable to catch food.

attacks.name: Ancient Whirlpool
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't attack.

name: Articuno

attacks.name: Ice Beam

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Ducklett

name: Swanna
description: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

name: Froakie

name: Frogadier
description: It can throw bubble-covered pebbles with precise control, hitting empty cans up to a hundred feet away.

name: Greninja

abilities.name: Water Shuriken

name: Pyukumuku

name: Bruxish

attacks.name: Second Strike

name: Snom

name: Frosmoth

attacks.name: Powder Snow

name: Pikachu

name: Raichu

attacks.name: Thunderbolt

attacks.name: Circle Circuit
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched {L} Pokémon.

abilities.name: Volt Charge

name: Voltorb

name: Electabuzz

attacks.name: Thunder Punch

name: Zapdos

attacks.name: Raging Thunder

attacks.name: Thundering Hurricane

name: Blitzle

name: Zebstrika

attacks.name: Thunder Spear
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Tynamo

name: Eelektrik

attacks.name: Thunder Fang

name: Heliolisk

attacks.name: Quick Attack

name: Pincurchin

tcgdex_attacks.name: Thunder Shock

name: Clefairy

name: Clefable
description: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: Abra

attacks.name: Teleport

name: Kadabra

name: Alakazam
description: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Slowpoke

name: Gastly

name: Gengar

name: Hypno

abilities.name: Sleep Pendulum
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Mr. Mime

attacks.name: Barrier Attack

name: Jynx

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Mewtwo

attacks.name: Power Blast

attacks.name: Double Lariat

name: Diglett

name: Dugtrio

attacks.name: Corner

name: Gyarados
